scripts.predev: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ports = @(8080, 3000); foreach ($port in $ports) { try { $process = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort $port -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($process) { Stop-Process -Id $process.OwningProcess -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host ('Killed process on port ' + $port) } else { Write-Host ('No process found on port ' + $port) } } catch { Write-Host $_.Exception.Message } }; exit 0"
